channel.title: Learing violin with Mr. Robert Lau
channel.description: Recent content on Learing violin with Mr. Robert Lau

item.title: Dr. S.Z.
item.description: I have recevied traning from Mr. Lau since I was 16. I am 60 year-old now. It is never to late to start!

item.title: Michelle W.
item.description: He is definitely a fantastic teacher!Ｉhave had lots of violin teachers, and his teaching techniques and strategies have helped me improve the fastest. He makes learning violin enjoyable and wants to see you improve. Highly recommend.

item.title: Mr. Lau's Teaching Philosophy | 柳老師的教學理念
item.description: Introduction Mr. Lau’s teaching philosophy is grounded as HK style.

item.description: Video 01: During Recital Video 02: During performance
